speaker: Vivian
text: Chapter Three: Custom Voice Mastery. I am Vivian. The Custom Voice engine is your fastest path to production-quality audio. It uses pre-trained speaker identities, so the voice you hear is stable, consistent, and ready for long-form narration.

speaker: Vivian
text: You have nine speakers to choose from. Ryan and Aiden are native English males. Vivian, Serena, Eric, Dylan, and Uncle Fu are Chinese voices. Ono Anna is Japanese. Sohee is Korean. Each has its own timbre and personality.

speaker: Vivian
text: Now listen carefully. I have just switched to the Seductive style. That single line of instruction changed my entire delivery. You type the acting direction into the Style Instruction field, and the model responds like a trained actor.

speaker: Vivian
text: The style dropdown is filled with presets you can load in one click. You can also type your own instruction directly, or modify an existing one. Instructions like 'whisper conspiratorially' or 'read as if excited but trying to stay calm' work extremely well.

speaker: Vivian
text: Once you have written a style you love, save it using the Save As field below the instruction box. Give it a name and it will appear in the dropdown from that point on, across all three engines.

speaker: Vivian
text: The Lang selector forces the accent of the speaker without changing the language of the text. For example, switching to German while keeping your English text will produce English spoken with a German accent. This is a powerful trick for creating foreign character voices.

speaker: Vivian
text: When you are ready, load Chapter Four: Voice Designer to learn how to invent entirely new characters.
